Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal text on recto (10 ll.), verso pasted down (containing names of witnesses). Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Marriage settlement between Phagonis son of Panobchunis and Tbokanupis daughter of Gay. Date. year 19 Phamenoth 29 of Ptol. Alexander = BC. 95 Apr. 13". Loose fragments of another text now EA 10836.
Curator's comments: Kaplony-Heckel, U., Das Getreide-Darlehn P. Haun. Inv. Demot. 2, in K. Ryhol (ed.), Acts of the seventh international conference of Demotic studies. Copenhagen, 2002, 246. Text 28 in Shore's Manuscript Catalogue of Demotic Gebelein Papyri in the British Museum. Publication in progress (C.J. Martin/S.E. Thomas). Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT. Here, also a P. BM EA 10514 B is listed, as a contract lease - presumably, now EA 10836.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (326) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/326)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: kraft paper Binding: copydex self adhesive carpet tape Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
